welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Auerbach, Germany! Get ready to be charmed by this quaint town known for its picturesque landscapes, delicious local cuisine and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Auerbach has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hof Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
